server.sharedRegions

Class Museum.Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.sharedRegions.Museum.Room
  • Enclosing class:
    Museum

    public class Museum.Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to represent a room in the museum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room(int id)
      Room constructor that takes an ID to initialize the room It also initializes the distance and number of paintings in the room randomly

      Room constructor with all fields
